attributes.action: Return all none British born people to their country of origin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like a Law passed to enable this to happen, i am fed up of ethnic races moving to Britain and expecting us to conform to their religion, education etc, if they cant abide by they way we live and our Laws, send them back to where they originally came from.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
